name: Proceeding to determine parentage ARTICLE 5. ENFORCEMENT OF SUPPORT ORDER WITHOUT REGISTRATION
text:
§576B-402  Proceeding to determine parentage.  (a)  A tribunal of this State authorized to determine parentage of a child may serve as a responding tribunal in a proceeding to determine parentage of a child brought under this chapter or a law or procedure substantially similar to this chapter.
     (b)  In a proceeding to determine parentage, a responding tribunal of this State shall apply chapter 584 and the rules of this State on choice of law. [L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
